snippet: The markets rose Monday, a day without any economic news and with investors still feeling optimistic after last week’s reports on jobs.
abstract: Stocks edge higher in a trading session marked by uncharacteristic quiet after a turbulent week.
lead_paragraph: The markets rose Monday, a day without any economic news and with investors still feeling optimistic after last week’s reports on jobs.

headline.main: Shares Rise as Turmoil Takes the Day Off
headline.print_headline: Shares Rise as Turmoil Takes the Day Off
